data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Dhalai, Tripura, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhalai, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Dhalai, Tripura, India. Please, stir the 131 believers here to pray for awakening.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 11,900 people living in Dhalai through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dhalai, Tripura, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bhir people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Dhalai, Tripura, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Dhalai.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Dhalai. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
